header.title: About Me
body: I have a passion for developing and creating web sites and applications and I strive to keep up with technology, industry trends and design practises as the internet and web development continues to evolve.
I take pride in writing standards compliant code that works on any modern browser, and using dynamic and exciting techniques to make the user experience easy and enjoyable.

items.body: Production of web applications in PHP and JavaScript
Development of RESTful APIs to support web and mobile applications
Mentoring and guidance of web development team
Refining development processes and standards
Facilitating rollout of GFE forecast upgrades
Development and maintenance of public web site
Providing technical advice and assistance on WCAG accessibility matters

items.title: Bureau's mobile website
items.body: A responsive site designed for mobile phones and tablets that utilises a new data API driven by a custom PHP framework.

items.title: Tide Predictions
items.body: Built with ExtJS and Openlayers to provide a map interface for users to select locations to view tide predictions, driven by PHP scripts that read data from XML sources.

items.title: Meteye
items.body: Award winning geospatial web application that displays current weather observations and various types of forecasts in an interactive map.
